title: enhancement request: support for s3:ObjectRestore:* bucket notifications
raw_output: {'files_to_modify': ['localstack/services/s3/provider.py', 'localstack/services/s3/s3_listener.py', 'localstack/services/s3/notifications.py', 'localstack/services/s3/models.py', 'localstack/aws/api/s3/__init__.py'], 'reasoning': '1. provider.py: Central S3 event handling, verification, and notification dispatch; key for supporting and triggering s3:ObjectRestore:* events. 2. s3_listener.py: Handles bucket notification config and emission for S3 events (must emit ObjectRestore notifications). 3. notifications.py: Forms and sends notifications for supported types; update dispatcher logic to recognize and send ObjectRestore events. 4. models.py: Stores bucket notification configs and schema—may require update for event support. 5. aws/api/s3/__init__.py: Event type declarations; already includes ObjectRestore but may need minor wiring for full support.'}
